text: Nuovo Mondo is the third studio album by Australian rock band Mondo Rock, released in July 1982. It was released through WEA Records and reached number 7 on the Kent Music Report. == Track listing == ==Charts== {|class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" |- !scope="col"| Chart (1982) !scope="col"| Position |- !scope="row"| Australian Kent Music Report. | style="text-align:center;"| 7 |- |} == References == Category:Mondo Rock albums Category:1982 albums Category:RCA Records albums Category:Polydor Records albums Category:Warner Music Group albums
title: Nuovo Mondo
